:defaultValue.description: Set the initial value. When 'range' is false, use number, otherwise use [number, number]
:defaultValue.description_zh: 设置初始取值。当 `range` 为 false 时，使用 number，否则用[number, number]

disabled.description: When the value is true, the slider is disabled
disabled.description_zh: 值为 true 时，滑块为禁用状态

keyboard.description: The handler can be operated using the keyboard
keyboard.description_zh: 支持使用键盘操作 handler

dots.description: Whether you can only drag and drop onto the scale
dots.description_zh: 是否只能拖拽到刻度上

included.description: marks is valid when the object is not empty, true indicates that the value is contained, and false indicates a tie
included.description_zh: marks 不为空对象时有效，值为 true 时表示值为包含关系，false 表示并列

:marks.description: For tick markers, the type of key must be 'number' and the value must be in the closed interval [min, max], and each label can be styled separately
:marks.default: { number: ReactNode } or { number: { style: CSSProperties, label: ReactNode } }
:marks.description_zh: 刻度标记，key 的类型必须为 `number` 且取值在闭区间 [min, max] 内，每个标签可以单独设置样式

:step.description: step size, which must be greater than 0 and divisible by (max - min). When 'marks' is not an empty object, you can set 'step' to null, and the only optional value in the slider is the part marked with marks
:step.description_zh: 步长，取值必须大于 0，并且可被 (max - min) 整除。当 `marks` 不为空对象时，可以设置 `step` 为 null，此时 Slider 的可选值仅有 marks 标出来的部分

tooltip.description_zh: 设置 Tooltip 相关属性

:value.description: Set the current value. When 'range' is false, use number, otherwise use [number, number]
:value.description_zh: 设置当前取值。当 `range` 为 false 时，使用 number，否则用[number, number]

vertical.description: When the value is true, the Slider is vertical
vertical.description_zh: 值为 true 时，Slider 为垂直方向

:trackStyle.description_zh: Slider 滑动条轨道样式 (选中范围内)

:railStyle.description_zh: Slider 滑动条轨道样式 (背景)

events.name: onAfterChange
events.description: Consistent with the 'onmouseup' trigger timing, the current value is passed in as a parameter
events.description_zh: 与 `onmouseup` 触发时机一致，把当前值作为参数传入

events.name: onChange
events.description: When the value of the slider changes, the onChange event is triggered, and the changed value is passed as a parameter
events.description_zh: 当 Slider 的值发生改变时，会触发 onChange 事件，并把改变后的值作为参数传入
